body:
## Workflow Health Monitoring Alert
  
  The workflow monitor has detected issues that require attention.
  
  **Detection Time:** 2025-11-15 06:19:46 UTC
  
  ### Health Summary
  - **Total Workflow Runs:** 100 (last 100 sampled)
  - **Completed Runs:** 57 (success + failure)
  - **Failed Runs:** 22
  - **Failure Rate:** 38.6% (of completed runs)
  
  ### Failed Workflows Breakdown
  - **.github/workflows/self-documenting-ai-enhanced.yml**: 10 failure(s)
- **AI**:  PR Failure Intelligence System:2 failure(s)
- **Addressing comment on PR #954**: 1 failure(s)
- **Code Quality**:  Analyzer:4 failure(s)
- **Running Copilot**: 2 failure(s)
- **System**:  PR Failure Learning:2 failure(s)
- **World Model Update**: 1 failure(s)
  
  ### Common Causes & Solutions
  
  #### 1. Workflow Triggering (HTTP 403)
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail when trying to trigger other workflows
  **Solution:** Remove `gh workflow run` commands; rely on scheduled triggers instead
  
  #### 2. Missing Secrets
  **Symptom:** Workflows requiring COPILOT_PAT fail or skip steps
  **Solution:** Configure required secrets in repository settings
  
  #### 3. External Dependencies
  **Symptom:** Workflows calling external APIs fail intermittently
  **Solution:** Add retry logic and graceful error handling
  
  #### 4. Configuration Issues
  **Symptom:** Workflows fail due to missing files or permissions
  **Solution:** Verify workflow configurations and file dependencies
  
  ### Recommended Actions
  1. Review the failed workflows breakdown above
  2. Check the Actions tab for detailed error logs
  3. Focus on workflows with multiple failures first
  4. Verify secrets and permissions are configured correctly
  5. Consider if recent changes introduced the failures
  
  ### Monitoring
  This issue will be automatically updated with health checks every 12 hours.
  Close this issue once all problems are resolved and failure rate drops below 20%.
  
  ---
  *This issue was automatically created by the System Monitor workflow.*
title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Workflow Health Alert - 2025-11-15

**Daily AI Goal for 2025-11-15**

**Category**: Automation

This goal will be worked on autonomously throughout the day. Progress will be checked every 3 hours.
